observationText: The Nf1flox/-;Krox20-Cre mice exhibited Schwann cell hyperplasia with substantial mast cell infiltration that progressed to neurofibromas, while the Nf1flox/flox;Krox20-Cre mice had a greatly reduced frequency, size and collagen accumulation of hyperplastic lesions in cranial nerves compared to Nf1flox/-;Krox20-Cre mice.
